original: > 80% of MIT spinoffs succeed _provided_ they have at least one management person in the team at the start. The business person represents the "voice of the customer" and that's what keeps the enginee...
translation: > 麻省理工学院的衍生公司中，80%能够成功，前提是团队在初创时至少有一位管理人员。这位商业人士代表着"客户的声音"，正是这一点确保工程师和产品开发不偏离正轨。
